part_description: Consists of a red base and top, silver metal parts inside. The base is flat and rectangular, while the top is curved and attached via a hinge. Contains a staple holder and a staple ejector.
internal_interaction_description: The top part hinges upward to allow loading of staples. When pressed down, the metal staple ejector pushes a staple through paper, while the anvil on the base bends the staple ends inward to secure sheets together.
external_interaction_description: The stapler interacts with paper by binding sheets together. It requires manual pressure to operate and is typically used on desks or flat surfaces. It can hold a limited number of staples, necessitating periodic reloading.
